Title: Bella's Beaus
Actors: Pearl White, Chester Barnett, Joseph Belmont
Plot: Beautiful Bella has two beaus, John whom she likes and Percy whom she tolerates. John is bashful and Bella plays Percy to wake John into a declaration. But Percy becomes a nuisance; he also scares John away. Percy takes Bella for a walk in the park. Then Bella, dressed in her prettiest, jumps into the lake and takes Percy with her. Despite this treatment, Percy sticks. So Bella hires "Kid" Long, a tough nut, to scare Percy. John overhears the girl's plot. Then John pays "Kid" a big prize to let him pose as a hero. "Kid" throws a big scare into Percy who runs away. John gets in a fake "knockout" on the "Kid" and thereby wins Bella who believes him to be a hero.
